mapper.select: select * from CIP_MEMBER order by NAME
select MEMBER_SEQ, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_NAME from MEMBER where MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER( MEMBER_SEQ, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_RESI, HOBBY_SEQ) values ( MEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{MEMBER_NAME}, #{MEMBER_PW}, #{MEMBER_TEL}, #{MEMBER_BIRTH}, #{MEMBER_RESI}, #{HOBBY_SEQ})
